bibl.title: Coptic Inscriptions in Egyptian Collections (Some Notes on Recent Publications).
bibl.note: Observations sur 61 inscriptions éditées par: Wolfgang BRUNSCH, Orientalia 60 (1991) pp. 92-108 et pll. I-XXVI; - Aegyptus 73 (1993) pp. 127-196, 55 figg.; - WZKM 84 (1994) pp. 9-33 et 28 pll.; - EVO 18 (1995 [1996]) pp. 65-117, figg., 10 pll. - Inscriptions grecques: Nos 4; 5; 7; 14; 23; 29; 33; 37; 41; 42; 45; 46; 53; 54; - Inscriptions grecques ou coptes: Nos 36; 38; 43; 57.
bibl.seg: HASITZKA Monika R.M., Adam LAJTAR and Tomasz MARKIEWICZ, Coptic Inscriptions in Egyptian Collections (Some Notes on Recent Publications).
